Popcorn Time! is the result of many deve: Popcorn Time! be th' result o' many developers 'n designers puttin' a bunch o' APIs together t' make th' experience o' watchin' torrent movies as simple as possible.
We are an open source project. We are fr: We be an open source project. We be from all o'er th' seven seas. We love our movies. 'n lad, do we love popcorn.

With Popcorn Time, you can watch Movies: Wit' Popcorn Time, ye can watch Movies 'n TV Series really easily. All ye 'ave t' do be skewer on one o' th' covers, then skewer 'Watch Now'. But yer experience be highly customizable:
Our Movies collection only contains High: Our Movies collection only contains High-Definition movies, available in 720p 'n 1080p. T' watch a movie, simply open Popcorn Time 'n navigate through th' movies collection, reachable through th' 'Movies' tab, in th' navigation bar. Th' default view will show ye all movies sorted by popularity, but ye can apply yer owns filters, thanks t' th' 'Genre' 'n 'Sort by' filters. Once ye 'ave chosen a movie ye wants t' watch, jab its cover. Then jab 'Watch Now'. Don't forget th' popcorn!
The TV Series tab, that you can reach by: Th' TV Series tab, that ye can reach by skewerin' 'TV Series' in th' navigation bar, will show ye all available series in our collection. Ye can also apply yer owns filters, same as th' Movies, t' help ye decide wha' t' watch. In this collection, also jus' skewer th' cover: th' new window that shall appear will allow ye t' navigate through Seasons 'n Episodes. Once yer mind be set, jus' skewer th' 'Watch Now' button.
A slider next to the 'Watch Now' button: A slider next t' th' 'Watch Now' button will let ye choose th' quality o' th' stream. Ye can also set a fixed quality in th' Settin's tab. Warnin': a better quality equals more data t' loot.
Most of our Movies and TV Series have su: Most o' our Movies 'n TV Series 'ave subtitles in yer speak. Ye can set them in th' Settin's tab. Fer th' Movies, ye can even set them through th' dropdown menu, in th' Movie Details page.
Clicking the heart icon on a cover will: Clickin' th' heart icon on a cover will add th' movie/show t' yer fav'rits. This collection be reachable through th' heart-shaped icon, in th' navigation bar. T' scuttle an item from yer collection, jus' jab on th' icon again! How simple be that?
Popcorn Time will keep in mind what you': Popcorn Time will keep in mind wha' ye've already watched - a wee help rememberin' doesn't cause any harm. Ye can also set an item as watched by skewerin' th' eye-shaped icon on th' covers. Ye can even build 'n synchronize yer collection wit' Trakt.tv website, via th' Settin's tab.
In Popcorn Time, you can use the magnifi: In Popcorn Time, ye can use th' magnifier icon t' open th' search. Type a Title, an Actor, a Director or even a Year, press 'Enter' 'n let us show ye wha' we can offer t' fill yer needs. T' close yer current search, ye can skewer on th' 'X' located next t' yer entry or type somethin' else in th' field.
If you prefer to use a custom player ins: If ye prefer t' use a custom player instead o' th' built in one, ye can do so by skewerin' th' allocated icon on th' 'Watch Now' button. A list o' yer installed players will be shown, select one 'n Popcorn Time will send everythin' t' it. If yer player ain't on th' list, report it t' us.
To push the customization even further,: T' push th' customization even further, we offer ye a large panel o' options. T' access th' Settin's, skewer th' wheel-shaped icon in th' navigation bar.
The entire list of keyboard shortcuts is: Th' entire list o' keyboard shortcuts be available by pressin' '?' on yer keyboard, or through th' keyboard-shaped icon in th' Settin's tab.
You can use custom torrents and magnets: Ye can use custom torrents 'n magnets links in Popcorn Time. Simply drag 'n drop .torrent files into th' application's window, 'n/or paste any magnet link.
On the details of Movies/TV Series, you: On th' details o' Movies/TV Series, ye can find a wee circle, colored in grey, red, yellow or green. Those colors refer t' th' health o' th' torrent. A green torrent will be looted smartly, while a red torrent may nah be looted at all, or mighty slowly. Th' color grey represents an error in th' health calculation fer Movies, 'n needs t' be jabbed in TV Series in order t' display th' health.
How does Popcorn Time work?: How does Popcorn Time set the sails?
Popcorn Time streams video content throu: Popcorn Time streams Movin' pictures through torrents. Our Movin' pictures are provided by YTS (http://yts.re) 'n our TV Series by EZTV (http://eztv.it), while gettin' all metadata from Trakt (http://trakt.tv). We don't host any content ourselves.
Torrent streaming? Well, torrents use Bi: Torrent streamin'? Well, torrents use Bittorrent protocol, which basically means that ye loot wee parts o' th' content from another user's 'puter, while sendin' th' parts ye already looted t' another user. Then, ye watch those parts, while th' next ones are bein' looted in th' background. This exchange allows th' content t' stay healthy.
Once the movie is fully downloaded, you: Once th' movie be fully looted, ye continue t' send parts t' th' other users. 'n everythin' be scuttled from yer 'puter when ye close Popcorn Time. As simple as that.
The application itself is built with Nod: Th' ship itself be built wit' Node-Webkit, HTML, CSS 'n Javascript. It sets the sails like th' Google Chrome browser, except that ye host th' biggest part o' th' code on yer 'puter. Aye, Popcorn Time sails on th' same technology as a regular website, like... let's say Wikipedia, or Youtube!
I found a bug, how do I report it?: I found a bug, how do I report it?
Error, database is probably corrupted. T: Error, database be prolly corrupted. Try flushin' th' history in settin's.
You can paste magnet links anywhere in P: Ye can paste magnet links anywhere in Popcorn Time wit' CTRL+V.
You can drag & drop a .torrent file into: Ye can drag & drop a .torrent file into Popcorn Time.
The Popcorn Time project started in Febr: Th' Popcorn Time project started in February 2014 'n has already had 150 scallywags that contributed more than 3000 times t' 'tis development in August 2014.
If a subtitle for a TV series is missing: If a subtitle fer a TV series be missin', ye can add it on opensubtitles.org. 'n th' same way fer a movie, but on yifysubtitles.com.
If you're experiencing connection drop i: If ye're experiencin' connection drop issues, try t' reduce th' DHT Limit in settin's.
If you search \"1998\", you can see all: If ye search "1998", ye can see all th' movies or TV series that came out that year.
You can login to Trakt.tv to save all yo: Ye can login t' Trakt.tv t' save all yer watched items, 'n synchronize them across multiple devices.
Clicking on the rating stars will displa: Clickin' on th' ratin' stars will display a number instead.
This application is entirely written in: 'Tis ship be entirely built with voodoo magic, like HTML5, CSS3 'n Javascript.
You can find out more about a movie or a: Ye can find out more about a movie or a TV series? Jus' skewer th' IMDb icon.
Clicking twice on a \"Sort By\" filter r: Clickin' twice on a "Sort By" filter reverses th' order o' th' list.
This feature only works if you have your: This feature only sails if ye 'ave yer TraktTv account synced. go t' Settin's 'n enter yer credentials.
